# topSeparatorVisibility

**Instance Property**

The visibility of the top separator for the item the configuration applies to.

## Declaration

```swift
var topSeparatorVisibility: UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility { get set }
```

## Controlling separator visibility

- **bottomSeparatorVisibility**: The visibility of the bottom separator for the item the configuration applies to.
- **UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility**: Constants that define the visibility of list separators.
